articles.description: Seattle Mariners’ left-hand pitcher and reigning Cy Young winner Robbie Ray is expected to sit out the team’s three-game series against the Toronto Blue
articles.content: Seattle Mariners left-hand pitcher and reigning Cy Young winner Robbie Ray is expected to sit out the teams three-game series against the Toronto Blue Jays this week. Ray is expected to return to the… [+850 chars]
